name: Chopper Rescue 3D
description:
Disaster! The city of (pseudo) Adelaide has experienced a massive electricity surge, and power is out across the city! To make matters worse, fires have broken out and citizens are stranded in the streets!

Jump in your chopper and winch important cargo, rescue citizens, and save the day!

Controls:
  • WASD/Joy Left Stick: Move
  • Left Shift/Joy A: Hold to boost
  • Space/Joy B: Tap to deploy/retract/stick magnetic winch head
  • F/Joy X: Tap to rotate chopper (face direction = faster)
Jam Game

This game was made for the AGD Arcade Jam. It is submitted in the state it was at the deadline, and as such there's a lot of wonky or missing stuff. Keep that in mind!

Known Issues:
  • Menu works with mouse only
  • Registering a proper landing can be finicky
